name: Basement of Hellish
description:
Basement of Hellish is a survival horror game with zombies in 1st person. Survive and struggle to find a way out in this horror game with tense and dark atmosphere.

Explore and manage your resources. Basement of Hellish is a game where every bullet matters.

Escape and find a way to survive in a basement infested with zombies and powerful enemies.

Key Features:

  • Dark atmosphere
    Tense enviroment. The game takes place in a basement with dark atmosphere and contains elements of blood and gore.

  • Limited Resources
    Use your resources wisely, after all, spending a bullet wrong can cause your death.

  • Explore and find a way out
    Look for items that will help your survival, fight and find a way to escape of this basement.

Features:

  • Tense Atmosphere
  • Dark and tight places
  • Gore
  • Some items are random
  • Limited ammo and batteries
  • Strong and tough enemies
  • 2 playable difficulties
  • 2 playable maps
